bibl.title: Coptic Antiquities. I. Stone Sculpture, Bronze Objects; Ceramic Coffin Lids and Vessels; Terracotta Statuettes, Bone, Wood, and Glass Artefacts.

series.title: Monumenta Antiquitatis extra fines Hungariae reperta.

bibl.note: 300 objects kept in the Budapest Museum of Fine Arts, representing all important aspects of daily life in 5th to 12th century A.D. Egypt.
bibl.seg: TÖRÖK László, Coptic Antiquities. I. Stone Sculpture, Bronze Objects; Ceramic Coffin Lids and Vessels; Terracotta Statuettes, Bone, Wood, and Glass Artefacts. (Monumenta Antiquitatis extra fines Hungariae reperta. 2.)
Roma, "L'Erma" di Bretschneider, 1993, 4°, 74 pp. et 106 pll. ISBN 88-7062-805-1. L. 180.000.
300 objects kept in the Budapest Museum of Fine Arts, representing all important aspects of daily life in 5th to 12th century A.D. Egypt.
